full_summary:
### Tender Notice

**Project Title:** Property Management, Project Delivery, and Optional Services

**Tender Reference:** WS3627997641

**Description:**
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (GAC) is seeking to enhance the scope, nature, structure, and construct of the Government of Canada's property management services through the provision of project delivery and optional services. 

**Background:**
This Request for Information (RFI) aims to gather industry feedback on the type, nature, and combination of services to be included in future Service Supply Demand (SSD) contracts managed by Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC) and the Automated Workload Distribution (AWD).

**Key Information:**

* **Tender Closing Date:** September 29, 2022, at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 1, 2022
* **Contract Type:** Competitive – Selective Tendering
* **Location:** Paris

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Tangbandja bi Tabiou
* **Email:** [tangbandjabi.tabiou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tangbandjabi.tabiou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** None
* **Company:** Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC)

**How to Participate:**
To access the full Request for Information (RFI) and supporting documentation, please log in to your SAP Ariba account and follow the instructions provided in the RFI document.

**Important Notes:**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the closing date and time.
* Bids submitted after the closing date and time will be considered non-responsive.

You can find the full tender notice and supporting documentation through the link below:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13858390?extsite=MTM4NTgzOTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
